content:
@Dave Register said

bdbcat pushed tag Release_5.8.0.

Thanks for all your work! It is a gift being part of this project, which should be impossible without you.

Perhaps one important thing now for all involved is that you are able to take some time off. The last days must have been painfuil if I understand this right
A message was moved here from #Master - 5.8.0 (was: comms) > wx3.2.2 compatibility by Alec Leamas.

@Alec Leamas
Thanks for the kind words. A formal release for all platforms is indeed a bit of a trial. So many moving parts, testing at each step. But I'll say that each release gets a bit easier as we improve and stabilize the tooling.
I plan to create a new branch called "v5.8.x" wherein we can confine and manage any backport activity on O58, and allow us to play in master as a WIP sandbox. I'd be very surprised if we do not find the need for a 5.8.2 update.
Cheers
